sentence.Network_en: The main cause of women's and children's oppression is patriarchy.
sentence.Network_cn: 妇女儿童受压迫的主要原因是父权制。

sentence.Network_en: a victim of oppression and tyranny
When did they rise against oppression?
sentence.Network_cn: 他们什么时候起来反抗压迫的?

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French, from Latin oppressio(n-), from the verb opprimere (see oppress)

entry.def: Oppression is the cruel or unfair treatment of a group of people.

example.tran: 企图逃避政治压迫的努力

example.ex: ...the oppression of the 19th-century poor by the rich.

means.word_mean: 1. the act of subjugating by cruelty;
2. the state of being kept down by unjust use of force or authority: "after years of oppression they finally revolted"

auth_sentence.content: No country can be led with atrocity and oppression.
auth_sentence.res_content: No country can be led with atrocity and oppression.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No country can be led with atrocity and oppression.

auth_sentence.content: They will re-tell their narratives of oppression and independence.
auth_sentence.res_content: They will re-tell their narratives of oppression and independence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They will re-tell their narratives of oppression and independence.

auth_sentence.content: We are against any oppression in our region.
auth_sentence.res_content: We are against any oppression in our region.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We are against any oppression in our region.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可压缩的, 可压榨的
stems_affixes.word_buile: compress[v.压缩]+ible能……的→adj.可压缩的, 可压榨的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 沮丧的,抑郁的;不景气的,萧条的
stems_affixes.word_buile: depress[v.压制,压抑]+ed……的→adj.沮丧的,抑郁的;不景气的,萧条的
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给人深刻印象的,感人的
stems_affixes.word_buile: impress印象,引人注目+ive……的→adj.给人深刻印象的,感人的
press挤压+ing……的→adj.急迫的
compress[v.压缩]+ion表名词→n.压缩,压紧,浓缩
depress[v.压制,压抑]+ion表名词→n.消沉;不景气萧条期
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达

stems_affixes.value_cn: 表达;表情;声调;腔调;榨出;措词;式;符号
stems_affixes.word_buile: express表达,表示+ion→n.表达;表情;声调;腔调;榨出;措词;式;符号
impress印象,引人注目+ion表名词→n.印象,感想;盖印,压痕
oppress[v.压迫,压制]+ion表名词→n.压迫

stems_affixes.value_cn: 压,压力,压迫,强制,紧迫,困苦,困难
stems_affixes.word_buile: press挤压+ure表名词→n.压,压力,压迫,强制,紧迫,困苦,困难
suppress[v.镇压,压制]+ion表名词→n.镇压,压制
press挤压→n.&n.&v.压, 按
com一起+press压→一起压→压缩
de向下+press压→向下压→压制→情绪低下
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达
im进+press挤压→压进去→盖印→印入头脑→留下印象
op加强动作+press挤压→拼命压→压迫
re回+press挤压→压回去
sup下+press压→压下去

means.word_mean: 压迫, 压制;压抑, 郁闷

sentences.en: Wherever there is oppression, there is resistance.
sentences.cn: 哪里有压迫, 哪里就有反抗。
